group_1.narration: My name is Karin Misono!@I go to Sakae Academy!
I love manga and@I'm in the Manga Club!
Well, in name anyway. I'm the only member@now that the upperclassmen graduated.
We don't actually have a club room right@now, so, me and a girl from the Art Club,@Alina, share a classroom together.

group_1.textRight: I, Alina, taught you the basics of sketching,@yet you've not learned anything...

group_1.narration: This is Alina-senpai. She's an art prodigy@who's won all kinds of awards. She quietly@works on her masterpieces here.
Because the school lets her use this @classroom to paint, she gives me short @lessons on drawing each day.

group_1.textLeft: Well, I might not be too good at sketches,@[chara:101201:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101201:cheek_0][chara:101201:motion_200][chara:101201:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:101201:lipSynch_1]b-but, I worked super hard on it!

group_1.textRight: The audience doesn't care how hard you@tried.
Even the plot... Peggiore! Honestly, this@is just garbage.
Ugh... I can't even look at it.
Do you know what the punishment is@for making me, Alina, angry like this?
If you do not wish for me to drink it,@then keep me satisfied!
Isn't your book debuting at the school fair?

group_1.textLeft: You say my work is so bad, though...

group_1.textRight: That is because your work is bad. There's@no reason to say otherwise.
So you have the energy to get angry! You@should work until you burn out completely.
Work that you compromise on before it's@complete is not work at all.

group_1.narration: Alina-senpai is really tough on me...@She gets mad like this every day.
But I'll show her! One day I'll make a manga@so great she won't drink my strawberry milk!
This is my grandma. She's always so@full of energy, open-minded, and cheerful.@And she loves manga just as much as me!
So it's no wonder we get along so well!

group_1.textRight: Karin, the new issue just arrived!
Yes, that one! I've already read it from@cover to cover!
In this issue, they picked up from last@year's Halloween story...

group_1.textLeft: No spoilers! We can get into the nitty gritty@after I read it!

group_1.textRight: All right. Shall we talk about it after@dinner, then?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101201:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yes! I bet there'll be so much to discuss! @We might end up talking all night!

group_1.narration: This is how I spend my days: I go to @school and draw during Manga Club.
Then, when I get home, I have@a great time with my grandma.
But there's a part of my life that I@keep hidden from everyone else...
A Magical Girl born of Halloween!@They call me "Phantom Thief Karin"!

group_1.textCenter: Weak and scrawny Magical Girls! Just wait@for me, and I will come!
I'll swoop in like a bat and save you!
Here's where the story really begins.
Who will be my target this time?
